Pre-Game Insights: The Marlins have won each of their last five-day games after playing the previous day.
The Pirates have lost eight of their last nine-day games at PNC Park following a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bailey Falter will be getting the start for the Pirates with a 7-7 record and an ERA of 4.45.
The Marlins are averaging 3.83 runs per game, while the Pirates' offense is averaging 4.24 runs per game.
Others: Shane Mickle predicts the Marlins to win on the money line.
The Pirates' offense was strong scoring six runs and that was enough for the victory in their previous game.
